channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: You Can Get Free AirPods 4 With Apple’s Back To School Offer In India. Here’s How
item.description: Apple's Back to School offer in India brings huge discounts on several accessories for both Mac and iPad.

item.title: The Wiretap: A Horrific Grooming Of A 10-Year-Old That Began On Roblox
item.description: A mother says her ten-year-old repeatedly tried to take her own life after being harassed by a man she met on Roblox.

item.title: Will The EU Roll Back 2035 EV Monopoly Target To Save Its Industry?

item.title: How Drone, 5G, And AI Technologies Are Enabling First Responders
item.description: Drones, 5G, and AI provide technological advancements and bring a fundamental change in how communities are protected when they need it most in a fiel...

item.title: Bungie Has Delayed ‘Marathon’ Indefinitely
item.description: In a somewhat expected but rather dire announcement, Bungie has emerged from the shadows to confirm that its upcoming shooter Marathon has been delaye...

item.title: “I made a mistake”

item.title: Orange cars

item.title: Rigor and curiosity

item.title: What do you need more of?
item.description: If our day (and our work) would get better if we had more: …we know where to get it. If not, then why are we spending our magical attention there?
